title: Rear Brake Pedal Pivot - Lubricate

body.body: Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Use Triumph Performance Brake and Chain Cleaner, or an equivalent, to clean all dirt and contamination from the pivot joint on the pedal grip of the rear brake pedal.
Apply Triumph Performance chain lubricant, or an equivalent lubricant, to the shaded area shown below.
Operate the pivoting action of the pedal grip to distribute the lubricant.

body.name: DS Rear Brake Pedal Grip Folding

body.body: Clean all surplus lubricant off the rear brake pedal and grip assembly.
